alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Juniata; Northumberland; Perry; Snyder (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 10:39AM EDT until July 09 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Juniata County in central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Perry County in south central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Snyder County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 1130 AM EDT. * At 1038 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Millersburg, moving northeast at 15 mph. Other storms were forming to the north and south of this storm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Millersburg, Lykens, Newport, Elizabethville, Port Trevorton, Meiserville, Urban, Liverpool, Wiconisco, Gratz, Millerstown and Dalmatia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
